filter.inkscape:menu-tooltip: Aquarelle paper effect which can be used for pictures as for objects
filter.inkscape:label: Rough Paper

filter.inkscape:menu-tooltip: Aquarelle paper effect which can be used for pictures as for objects
filter.inkscape:label: Rough Paper

flowRoot.flowPara: This template is meant to help creating a new clock-face. I'm using Inkscape to design them to achieve precise graphics through vectors.

You may want to use a different (vector-) program, BUT things like guides will probably be missing for you then. Inkscape is free and Open Source, so... You should at least read this Template with it.

This texture is a combination of multiple textures for Analogue-Clock. If you display "Guides" in Inkscape, you will see many helper guides. The green ones show where the textures are separated. The yellow ones show the normally visible area (use the rest of the space for shadows, etc.) the blue ones are "other".
This is the Clock face or Background
The texture default orientation is for 12 o'clock. So vertical to the top. This applies to all "hands"
It behaves exactly like the hour hand.
It behaves exactly like the hour hand.
